headline: 🚨💥 UKRAINIAN ZOOMERS 😩👶 GETTING DM'D ON TELEGRAM 📱🔥 BY RUSKY HANDLERS 🕵️‍♂️🇷🇺 TO YEET BOMBS 💣🍆 AT THEIR OWN HOMIES ‼️💸 'SEND NUDES OR CONSCRIPTION VANS GO BOOM' 🤯🫣
text:
UH-OH⁉️😱 PUTIN'S PUPPET MASTERS 🧛‍♂️🇷🇺 SLIDING INTO UKRAINE KIDDO DMs 📲💬 on TELEGRAM 😤🔥, RECRUITING TEEN SABOTEURS 👦💥 to BLOW UP 🧨 their own BACKYARD 🏠💣! Ukrainian gov spilling TEA ☕📢: HUNDREDS of zoomers, even 9-YO GAMER GREMLINS 🎮👶, getting BAGGED 💰 for SABOTAGE JOBS like planting BOMBS in CONSCRIPTION VANS 🚐💥 'cuz nobody simps for draft daddies 😤🪖!

PEEP V LAD 👦🔥, 17-YO EASTERN UKRO BOI who ROAD-TRIPPED 500 MILES 🗺️💨 to RIVNE PARK 🌳🕵️‍♂️ for a HIDDEN BOMB + BURNER PHONE 📱💣 PROMISED $2K 💸🍆 to WIRE IT UP 🔌⚡ and LIVE-STREAM 📹 the VAN VIBE CHECK so RUSKY ROMAN 🧔🇷🇺 could YEET DETONATE 🧨 remotely! 'I THOUGHT I'D GO BOOM 😵💥,' he SPILLED to BBC 🗣️📺, now CHILLING in SBU JAIL ⛓️👮‍♂️ awaiting 12-YR TERROR STRETCH 🔒🕰️. 'Nobody likes conscription COCKBLOCKERS 🍆🚫,' he SHRUGS 😏.

SBU TEA ☕: 800+ RECRUITS 🇺🇦➡️🇷🇺, 240 MINORS 👶💣 some as YOUNG as 11, MIXING HOUSEHOLD CHEM GOO 🧪💥 into MOLOTOVS 🥤🔥 for ARMY OFFICES 🏢🪖 or POLICE STANS 🚔. Andriy Nebytov SPILLIN: 'ENEMY LOVES VULNERABLE NOOBS 😢 who don't GET the BODY COUNT 📈☠️!' CYBER QUEEN Anastasiia 📡👩‍💻 knows EVEN 9-YOs getting PINGED 🤖.

VLAD'S ORIGIN STORY 🦸‍♂️: JOINED TELEGRAM 'REMOTE GIGS' CHANNELS 📱💼, ROMAN HIT HIM UP in 30 MINS ⏱️💨 with RUSSIAN SLANG ACCENT 🗣️🇷🇺. STARTED SMALL: GRAB GRENADE 💣❌ (GHOSTED 😤 but PAID $30 💸), THEN TORCH VAN 🔥🚐 for $100 CRYPTO 🪙 (SHORTED on $1.5K PROMISE 🤬). NEXT LEVEL: RIVNE BOMB HEIST 🏦💥! CHANNELS STOKED ANTI-DRAFT RAGE 😡🪖 with FIRE CLIPS 🔥📹 claiming 'WE ORDERED THAT SHIT 💪' – BBC undercover burner'd 'em 📴🕵️‍♂️ and got PRICE SHEETS 💰📋: $1.5K POST OFFICE BLITZ 🔥🏢, $3K BANK SMASH 💥🏦 'cuz SECURITY GLASS = EXTRA THICC 🍑🛡️ – POUR PETROL 🛢️ or MOLOTOV YEET 🥤💨!'

EVEN BEAUTY TIP GROUPS 💅📱 and REFUGEE CHATS 🏃‍♂️💨 DROPPING 'HIGH PAY PART-TIME' BAIT 🎣, leading to 'I NEED ALL THE ARSON 🥵🔥 SEND VID PROOF 📹 or NO BAGS 💸!' Recruiters SIMPIN HARD 😩: 'Reliable arson SLUTS 🫦 are RARER than my payouts ⚡!' BBC SNITCHED 👮📢, Telegram YEETED a FEW ❌ but MOST STILL POPPIN OFF 📈📱 – one grew 750 SIMPS since! Telegram COP-OUT: 'No VIOLENCE VIBES allowed 😇🚫.'

EURO GOVS SPILLIN: RUSKY AGENTS 🕵️‍♂️🇷🇺 BAGGING YOUNG DUDES for ARSON/SPY SHIT 🌍🔥 – UK JAILLED 6 for LONDON WAREHOUSE TORCH aiding UKRAINE 🇬🇧🚒! In UKRO, SABOS AWAIT TRIAL ⚖️ but some GO BOOM 😵💥 – SBU CLAIMS HANDLERS REMOTE-DET 💣☠️ like MARCH RAIL BOMB that FRYED a 17-YO and MAIMED 15-YO 🚂💥. Russia FLIPS SCRIPT: 'UKRAINE DOES IT TOO 👶🇺🇦!' HARD to VERIFY 🕵️‍♂️🤷‍♂️.

VLAD'S FINAL BOP 🎤💀: 'DON'T BE DUMB 😤 – THEY CHEAT YOU INTO JAIL ⛓️ or YOUR HANDS GO BOOM 💥👐!' SO SHARE 📤 this to 8️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ TELEGRAM TEENS 👦📱 – GET 0 BACK? YOU'RE A PUTIN PAWN ♟️🇷🇺😭! GET 240? MINOR SABO SLUT 💣👶! GET 800? CERTIFIED BOMBER BADDIE 💥👑 – but DON'T, or SBU GONNA DOM YOU ⛓️🍆‼️
